topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
Ledger users are being targeted by a phishing campaign featuring a fake merger between Ledger and Trezor. This follows a data breach at Ledger's e-commerce partner, Global-e, which exposed customer contact and order information.
Sources:
- https://cryptopotato.com/ledger-users-targeted-in-phishing-scam-following-global-e-data-breach

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
Flow released details regarding a December exploit involving counterfeit tokens that resulted in losses totaling $3.9 million.
Sources:
- https://cryptopanic.com/news/28563003/Flow-details-December-exploit-that-led-to-39M-in-losses-due-to-counterfeit-tokens

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
NordVPN has officially denied claims of a data breach following reports that a hacker leaked company data online.
Sources:
- https://twitter.com/41258937/status/2008500050981515388

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
A hacker successfully exploited a multi-signature wallet to steal approximately $27.3 million, with subsequent reports from PeckShield indicating the attacker is laundering the stolen ETH.
Sources:
- https://cryptopanic.com/news/28543090/Hacker-Steals-273M-Using-Multi-Signature-Wallet-Exploit
- https://cryptopanic.com/news/28545264/Crypto-hacker-launders-more-ETH-from-compromised-multisig-as-27M-exploit-unfolds-PeckShield

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
The ClickFix attack campaign is reportedly utilizing deceptive Windows Blue Screen of Death (BSOD) screens to trick users into installing malware.
Sources:
- https://twitter.com/128484298/status/2008378424591630574
